product_name: SmartWool Lightweight Zip T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering natural, breathable warmth, the SmartWool Lightweight ZipT-Shirt for women keeps you comfortable as a base layer for a day on the slopes or when worn by itself on mild days. Lightweight merino wool wicks moisture, dries quickly and resists odor. Deep front zipper ventilates instantly and protects skin with a zipper guard. Unlike traditional wool, SmartWool items do not itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. SmartWool Lightweight Zip T-Shirt is formfitting; droptail hem provides complete coverage; flatlock seams minimize chafing. Closeout.
short_description: Offering natural, breathable warmth, the SmartWool Lightweight ZipT-Shirt for women keeps you comfortable as a base layer for a day on the slopes or when worn by itself on mild days.
